title: What means traditional if you change a traditional Skin?
body: I´m a Karma main and was always a fan of the traditional skin because it reminded me on the beginnings of Karma. Now you changed that Skin? WTF are you thinking? What does traditional mean if you update them just as you please. This is just one sign how you ruin thi game. Nothing seems to be sacred.  I´m pissed as hell about that. Just had to write outf my anger. Thaks for listening. If you feel the same about it pls comment.

replies.body:
KARMA MAINS UNITE! <3
Meinst nur das Splash oder?
Ja is schon nur das Splash, aber trotzdem. Auch das Splash ist Teil des traditional Skins. Für mich ist es ein Unding da irgendwie dran rum zu pfuschen.
Die haben lediglich ihr Splash-Art geändert. Der Skin selber sieht genau so aus wie vorher.
Die verändern den Skin? Wow, das finde ich auch seltsam.
